summary: This is an internal email from a prosecutor's office regarding a draft letter responding to Ghislaine Maxwell's requests for redactions and an in-camera proceeding. It references attached filings and an order from Judge Nathan, and notes the response is due that day.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the letter is responding to her requests for redactions and an in-camera proceeding.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Issued an order directing the government to respond to Maxwell's sealing requests.

connections.description: Judge Nathan is presiding over Maxwell's case and has issued an order regarding her sealing requests.

events.title: Draft Response to Maxwell's Sealing Requests
events.description: Prosecutors prepare a draft letter responding to Ghislaine Maxwell's requests for redactions and an in-camera proceeding, as ordered by Judge Nathan.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell made requests for redactions and an in-camera proceeding in her case.
Judge Nathan issued an order directing the government to respond to Maxwell's sealing requests.
The government's response to these requests was due on December 2, 2020.
